basics.name: Russell Jones
basics.label: Drupal Developer
basics.summary: Drupal developer with fifteen years of experience in site building, custom module development, and frontend theming. Driven to provide excellent service and high-quality coding to create secure and functional sites for clients. Expert in Drupal and up to date on the latest developments and versions. Managed several projects for various clients in all industries using Drupal 4.7 through to version 9, including full Drupal deployment services.

volunteer.summary: Web Networks, founded in 1987, provides internet-based technologies to a great variety of non-profits, governments, and public institutions, as well as businesses and individuals, locally, across Canada, and internationally.

work.summary: Architect and develop websites in Drupal including custom modules in PHP7/8. Build custom themes for Drupal, using PHPTemplate, Twig, HTML, CSS, SASS, jQuery and Javascript.
highlights: Perform data migrations to Drupal 8 and 9 from a variety of data sources including previous Drupal versions, MYSQL, and flat files.
Upgrade custom Drupal Modules and Themes to Drupal 8 and 9.
Perform periodic and security updates as they are issued on drupal.org.

work.summary: Drupal Site Building, Responsive Theming, Module Development, Views, Entity API, Forms API, Migrate API, Configuration API, RESTful Web Services API, Paragraphs, Layout Builder, Drupal Administration, Composer, Drush, Maintenance and Support.
Maintained a network supporting 100+ desktop users and 20+ servers in a VMWare vSphere ESXi environment.
highlights: Managed internal IT personnel and hardware/software vendors.

work.summary: Developed 2D animations of complex mining and milling processes using the svg.js (http://svgjs.com/) library.
Worked with a diverse team to create Yodigo; an HTML5 e-Literacy game built using Agile development methods.
Setup new office with communications and IT infrastructure and provided day-to-day IT support.
Managed a complex network with 6 physical sites and hundreds of employees/contractors.
highlights: Moved office headquarters with no interruption in network services
Migrated legacy mail system to Exchange
Used Drupal to build a project and asset management system.

work.summary: Part of a PHP development team maintaining a custom CRM system.
Managed online marketing resources; acting as lead developer for all projects in an environment of PHP/ASP.
work.highlights:
Also managed network infrastructure and servers, based on a mixed environment of Microsoft Windows 2000 (AD/IIS) and Linux (LAMP stack) servers.

Provided day-to-day IT support to office staff.

work.summary: Worked with a team to deliver websites to clients in Silicon Valley.
Maintained a small computer network for public use.  Assisted users with Internet research and using Microsoft Office.
Provided computer tech support over the phone for Gateway computer users throughout the USA.
